DOC.brief_title: Formulation Food Effect Study AZD1386 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Females must nonfertile ( Amenorrhea pregnancy last 12 month prior enrolment documentation irreversible surgically sterile ) . Healthy male volunteer BMI 18 30 kg/m2 Clinical normal physical finding , include blood pressure , pulse rate 45 bpm , ECG , laboratory assessment . Normal QTc interval baseline ECG , 360450 msec , accord Fridericia formula . History severe allergy/hypersensitivity symptoms/signs ongoing allergy/hypersensitivity judge Investigator . Requirement concomitant medication study , exclude hormone replacement therapy ( HRT ) use drug enzyme induce property 3 week first dose Smoking 7 cigarette per week consumption 3 portion snuff equivalent per day within 30 day first administration study drug A family history short QT syndrome ( SQTS ) sudden cardiac death ( SCD ) amongst first degree relative QT/QTc < 360 m
